item.description:
CNHT will hold their Annual Taxpayer Reunion Picnic at the Hopkinton Fair Grounds, Hopkinton NH on Saturday July 5th, 2008 from 12 Noon to 5 PM. Parking is in the rear and to the left after entering Gate G off Kearsage Avenue.

As in the past, organizations who have purchased at least one ticket are invited to set up a display table. Reserve your space soon by writing to the Webmaster to express your intentions. All cars used to transport tables and canopies must be removed from the midway by 11:30 AM

Relive the moment when Ron Paul won the straw poll from last year.
Now KEEP THE REVOLUTION ALIVE and work with local groups here in New Hampshire.
item.name: CNHT picnic @ Hopkinton Fairgrounds
